thread.title: Setback for Sasikala as top AIADMK MLA extends his support to Panneerselvam
thread.title_full: Setback for Sasikala as top AIADMK MLA extends his support to Panneerselvam - The Economic Times

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Setback for Sasikala as top AIADMK MLA extends his support to Panneerselvam
text:
NEW DELHI: Senior AIADMK leader Madhusudanan today switched sides and announced his support for Tamil Nadu Chief Minister O Panneerselvam . 

"I have come to offer my support to Panneerselvam'," Madhusudanan said while arriving at Panneerselvam's house. 

Panneerselvam said that Madhusudanan threatened and pressurised by Sasikala . "Our senior leader Madhusudan was threatened & pressurised, even after that he stood alone to safeguard party. We welcome him," he said. 

AIADMK Rajya Sabha MP V Maitreyan said O Pannerselvam is the real heir of Amma (Jayalalithaa). 

Ex-Minister KP Munusamy, MP V Maitreyan, PH Pandian, Natham Viswanathan welcomed AIADMK presidium chairman E Madhusudanan in the OPS camp.
